title: Giving Thanks for Freedom and Growth
description: Economic liberty is the foundation of our better lives.
content: Why did men die of hunger, for six thousand years? Why did they walk, and carry goods and other men on their backs, for six thousand years, and suddenly, in one century, only on a sixth of this earth… [+11506 chars]
